attributes.action: Get government funding for Impact Ashford!
attributes.additional_details:
I want the Government to help fund this amazing course because It has had a massive impact on many young lives especially mine and it would be a shame to see it close.

Impact Ashford for anyone ages 16-18 and is a high intense, physical and academic training course for those who are interested in the Armed Forces, Personal Training, Uniform Services or preparing you for work.

However, some young people join the programme to improve their confidence and motivation as well as their self discipline in order to improve their employability prospects. The course is divided into three sections: Academics, Physical Training and Activities. IMPACT is a non-residential course that runs for 13 weeks.

There mission is to improve your general attitude and self-discipline and enable you to stand on your own two feet. Also to provide you with essential information and career guidance.
